title: Hydrogen Storage measuremet data model
description: A instantaneous measure of pressure and ambient temperature in a hydrogen storage tank

id.description: Property. Unique ID of the object

type.description: Property. Title of the form element

dataProvider.description: Property. A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity

dateModified.description: Property. Timestamp of the last modification of the entity

refHydrogenStorage.description: Property. A reference to the entity HydrogenStorage which it belongs the measurement
